attributes.action: More help for victims of Anti Social Behaviour occuring that cannot be proven
attributes.additional_details:
Victims are very often targeted continually as in my case even though I have Police crime references nothing can be done and I am left with a feeling of hopelessness.
You are left wondering when the next episode will occur. Authorities seem to be powerless to do anything and the victim is left feeling like the criminal.
I would like more laws in place to help victims as this is still a grey area.
attributes.background:
I have through personal experience felt that victims are left feeling that they are the criminals.
Victims need more protection especially when there are criminal offences ocuring that are difficult to prove and authorities are powerless to help. We need more protection, please.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
